mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, pay_status, amount, remark, phone, consignee, delivery_status, delivery_time, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) VALUES (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{consignee}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{deliveryTime}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})
